com.piggybox.model.aem

Class DetectActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<T>
      • org.apache.pig.AccumulatorEvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.DataBag>
        • com.piggybox.model.aem.DetectActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.pig.Accumulator<org.apache.pig.data.DataBag>

    public class DetectActivity
extends org.apache.pig.AccumulatorEvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.DataBag>
    The pig UDF implementing the AID algorithm of Activity-Entity Model. Input: a bag of tuples (HttpRequestStartTime, HttpRequestEndTime, URL, Referrer, ContentType ..) Return: a bag of tuples, each tuple being appended by an activity ID (UUID);
    Author:
    chenxm
